name: Escape Game: 3 monsters
description:
That's my first released game. It would be good to have a feedback from you.

STORY: You've found yourself in a strange place with 3 monsters staring at you and trying to talk. Find a way to escape from that place.

FEATURES:
- Unique selfmade 3d plasticine world with various characters and items.
- Escape game with interesting puzzles.

DISCLAIMER: Advanced English is needed to solve some puzzles.
